mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_student_rel(student_id, course_id) SELECT course_id, #{studentId} AS student_id FROM ( SELECT course_id, COUNT(course_id) AS population FROM course_student_rel WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ) csr LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, containment FROM course) c ON c.id = csr.course_id WHERE population <= containment
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM course_student_rel WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
